text: Elections in India in 2020 will include bye-elections to the Lok Sabha, elections to the Rajya Sabha for 73 Seats, elections to state legislative assemblies of 3 states and numerous other bye-elections to state legislative assemblies, councils and local bodies. ==Legislative assembly elections== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
